text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to craft a note block on minecraft?
text.Response A: To craft a note block in Minecraft, you will need three planks, four iron ingots, and one redstone dust. Place the planks in a V shape on the crafting table, then place the iron ingots in the middle of the V. Finally, place the redstone dust in the middle of the iron ingots. This will create a note block that you can place in the world and play different musical notes by right-clicking it with a variety of instruments.
text.Response B: To craft a note block in Minecraft, you will need to gather the following items: 3 wooden planks, 3 iron ingots, and 1 redstone dust. First, combine the three wooden planks to make a wooden slab. Then, place the wooden slab in the bottom right corner of the crafting table and add the three iron ingots in the top left, middle right, and bottom left corners. Finally, place the redstone dust in the top right corner of the crafting table, and your note block will be crafted!

meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

Prompt

Can you tell me how to craft a note block on minecraft?

Response A

To craft a note block in Minecraft, you will need three planks, four iron ingots, and one redstone dust. Place the planks in a V shape on the crafting table, then place the iron ingots in the middle of the V. Finally, place the redstone dust in the middle of the iron ingots. This will create a note block that you can place in the world and play different musical notes by right-clicking it with a variety of instruments.

Response B

To craft a note block in Minecraft, you will need to gather the following items: 3 wooden planks, 3 iron ingots, and 1 redstone dust. First, combine the three wooden planks to make a wooden slab. Then, place the wooden slab in the bottom right corner of the crafting table and add the three iron ingots in the top left, middle right, and bottom left corners. Finally, place the redstone dust in the top right corner of the crafting table, and your note block will be crafted!
